/* 다운로드 이력 count selectCount */ select count(*) as tot_cnt ,CEILING(CAST(COUNT(*) as float) / ${top_cnt}) as page_cnt from tbl_down_hist WITH(NOLOCK) where down_datm between convert(datetime, #{down_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{down_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and down_id like #{down_id} + '%'
and down_name like #{down_name} + '%'
and rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and user_id like #{user_id} + '%'
and user_name like #{user_name} + '%'
and reason_code like #{reason_code} + '%'
and down_src !='AP'

/* 다운로드 이력 조회 selectList */ select (${tot_cnt}-rownum+1) idx, * from ( select top ${end_cnt} ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir}) as rownum ,convert(varchar(19),a.down_datm,121) down_datm ,a.down_id ,a.down_name ,a.down_ip ,convert(varchar(19),a.rec_datm,121) as rec_datm ,a.rec_keycode ,a.rec_filename ,a.user_id ,a.user_name ,a.local_no ,isnull(a.reason_code,'') as reason_code ,isnull(a.reason_text,'') as reason_text ,(case a.down_src when 'AP' then 'TA' else '' end) as down_src ,(case when isnull(a.reason_code,'')!='' then dbo.fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON',a.reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code and mpart_code = b.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code and mpart_code = b.mpart_code and spart_code = b.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_down_hist as a WITH(NOLOCK) left join tbl_user as b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.down_id = b.user_id where a.down_datm between convert(datetime, #{down_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{down_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and a.down_id like #{down_id} + '%'
and a.down_name like #{down_name} + '%'
and a.rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and a.user_id like #{user_id} + '%'
and a.user_name like #{user_name} + '%'
and a.reason_code like #{reason_code} + '%'
and a.down_src !='AP'
order by ${sort_idx} ${sort_dir} ) U where rownum between ${start_cnt} and ${end_cnt}

/* 다운로드 이력 전체 조회 (엑셀다운로드) selectListAll */ select convert(varchar(19), a.down_datm, 121) as down_datm ,a.down_id ,a.down_name ,a.down_ip ,convert(varchar(19), a.rec_datm, 121) as rec_datm ,a.rec_keycode ,a.rec_filename ,a.user_id ,a.user_name ,a.local_no ,isnull(a.reason_code, '') as reason_code ,isnull(a.reason_text, '') as reason_text ,(case a.down_src when 'AP' then 'TA' else '' end) as down_src ,(case when isnull(reason_code,'')!='' then dbo.fn_GetCodeName('LD_REASON',reason_code) else '' end) as reason_code_desc ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 1 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code) as bpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 2 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code and mpart_code = b.mpart_code) as mpart_name ,(select part_name from tbl_user_group WITH(NOLOCK) where part_depth = 3 and bpart_code = b.bpart_code and mpart_code = b.mpart_code and spart_code = b.spart_code) as spart_name from tbl_down_hist as a WITH(NOLOCK) left join tbl_user as b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.down_id = b.user_id where down_datm between convert(datetime, #{down_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{down_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and a.down_id like #{down_id} + '%'
and a.down_name like #{down_name} + '%'
and a.rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997')
and a.user_id like #{user_id} + '%'
